form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cruz (for himself and Mr. Sessions) introduced the following bill; which was read the first time
Read the second time and placed on the calendar

form.official-title: To prevent the expansion of the Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals program unlawfully created by Executive memorandum on August 15, 2012.

section.header: Limitation on Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals; restrictions on employment authorization for aliens not in lawful status
section.text: No agency or instrumentality of the Federal Government may use Federal funding or resources—

paragraph.text: to consider or adjudicate any new or previously denied application of any alien requesting consideration of deferred action for childhood arrivals, as authorized by Executive memorandum on August 15, 2012; or
to authorize any alien to work in the United States if such alien—

subparagraph.text: was not lawfully admitted into the United States in compliance with the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1101 et seq.); and
is not in lawful status in the United States on the date of the enactment of this Act.

endorsement.action-desc: Read the second time and placed on the calendar
